item.title: RT by @0xstark: Adding a short personal take with each QT, let's see how it goes!
item.dc:creator: @barnabemonnot

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 31. @EAS_eth lets you use Ethereum to make attestations ("The University of Ethereum confirms that 0xstark.eth has completed a training course in...")
It's open source, permissionless, and token-free. It's been used by 420K attesters to make 7M attestations, to 1.4M recipients.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
31. @EAS_eth lets you use Ethereum to make attestations ("The University of Ethereum confirms that 0xstark.eth has completed a training course in...")

It's open source, permissionless, and token-free. It's been used by 420K attesters to make 7M attestations, to 1.4M recipients.

item.title:
one role of the ecosystem is to have beliefs about what is good, what is valuable, and what is not
we can (and should) argue where the lines are, but any ecosystem that simply gives up on any responsibility to answer those questions is dead already
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
one role of the ecosystem is to have beliefs about what is good, what is valuable, and what is not

we can (and should) argue where the lines are, but any ecosystem that simply gives up on any responsibility to answer those questions is dead already

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 30. >@Railgun_Project enables fully private DeFi transactions on Ethereum using zero-knowledge proofs
Railgun is a system of smart contracts that lets you transact, swap, lend, and borrow with full privacy, without using custodial bridges.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
30. @Railgun_Project enables fully private DeFi transactions on Ethereum using zero-knowledge proofs

Railgun is a system of smart contracts that lets you transact, swap, lend, and borrow with full privacy, without using custodial bridges.

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: Excited to unveil a special collaboration with many teams across Ethereum. Big step forward for getting seamless cross-chain UX into the hands of all users. Still much to do & one big piece of the larger interop picture üî•
Huge thanks to all the teams supporting: @hyperlane, @arbitrum, @Starknet, @AcrossProtocol, @DeFi_Wonderland, @LineaBuild, @namechain, @Optimism, @0xPolygon, @Scroll_ZKP, @soneium, @taikoxyz, @Uniswap, @zksync, @EspressoSys, @t1protocol, @Polymer_Labs, @biconomy, @lifiprotocol, @OffchainLabs, @OpenZeppelin, @gnosischain, @EverclearOrg, @ensdomains, @bootnodedev, @eco, @hashialliance, @SuccinctLabs, @Calderaxyz, @superbridgeapp, @nomial_io, @khalani_network
item.dc:creator: @rudolf6_
item.description:
Excited to unveil a special collaboration with many teams across Ethereum. Big step forward for getting seamless cross-chain UX into the hands of all users. Still much to do & one big piece of the larger interop picture üî•

Huge thanks to all the teams supporting: @hyperlane, @arbitrum, @Starknet, @AcrossProtocol, @DeFi_Wonderland, @LineaBuild, @namechain, @Optimism, @0xPolygon, @Scroll_ZKP, @soneium, @taikoxyz, @Uniswap, @zksync, @EspressoSys, @t1protocol, @Polymer_Labs, @biconomy, @lifiprotocol, @OffchainLabs, @OpenZeppelin, @gnosischain, @EverclearOrg, @ensdomains, @bootnodedev, @eco, @hashialliance, @SuccinctLabs, @Calderaxyz, @superbridgeapp, @nomial_io, @khalani_network

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: Announcing the Open Intents Framework ‚ú®
Ecosystem-wide interop, accelerated by 30+ teams from all corners of Ethereum.
A modular, open framework to make it seamless for any chain to get intents into the hands of users & improve cross-chain UX.

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 29. SecretAgent is a prizewinning hack from @ETHGlobal's Agentic Ethereum hackathon.
The project lets crypto-native AI agents securely manage API keys, for instance to enable the agent to pay for its own LLM access. Built by @theozero, @sergedottech, and Phil Miller.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
29. SecretAgent is a prizewinning hack from @ETHGlobal's Agentic Ethereum hackathon.

The project lets crypto-native AI agents securely manage API keys, for instance to enable the agent to pay for its own LLM access. Built by @theozero, @sergedottech, and Phil Miller.

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 28. @Livepeer powers real-time AI video with decentralized infrastructure.
A global network of nodes receive and perform compute tasks, in exchange for micropayments and a stake in the network.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
28. @Livepeer powers real-time AI video with decentralized infrastructure.

A global network of nodes receive and perform compute tasks, in exchange for micropayments and a stake in the network.

item.title: RT by @0xstark: even if the original vision of memecoins was good, its hard to believe anyone can argue in good faith that the current meta is anything but negative sum. memecoins are a wildfire burning through our industry, and if we dont want to be left with only ashes then it's time to act
item.dc:creator: @samczsun
item.description: even if the original vision of memecoins was good, its hard to believe anyone can argue in good faith that the current meta is anything but negative sum. memecoins are a wildfire burning through our industry, and if we dont want to be left with only ashes then it's time to act

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: Totally disagree with this take. Issuing assets on the L2 aligns the asset with the social consensus of the L2.
For it to be Ethereum aligned, it should be minted and its supply governed on Ethereum Mainnet.
Only exception would be for a native rollup.
item.dc:creator: @liamihorne
item.description:
Totally disagree with this take. Issuing assets on the L2 aligns the asset with the social consensus of the L2.

For it to be Ethereum aligned, it should be minted and its supply governed on Ethereum Mainnet.

Only exception would be for a native rollup.

nitter.freedit.eu/haydenzadams/status/1890432415132217595#m

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: 1/Driving real world impact with Ethereum in LatAm, a guest thread by @0xcush
In a region marked by financial exclusion, corruption and poor governance, Ethereum is paving the way for a more prosperous future for the region.
item.dc:creator: @ethereum
item.description:
1/Driving real world impact with Ethereum in LatAm, a guest thread by @0xcush

In a region marked by financial exclusion, corruption and poor governance, Ethereum is paving the way for a more prosperous future for the region.
